interestingcomments.content:
Weird interaction between the Camera Remote app and Google Photos /!/ For some reason recently Google Photos has started thinking that a group of images transferred at the same time through Camera Remote is a burst shot, and not handling them properly. There's also no way of **ungrouping** those images.

I don't know when this started happening, but it definitely used to work normally. I'm not even sure if an update to Camera Remote or an update from Google Photos is the culprit.

Anyone else experienced this? Anyone found a workaround?
